name: Updownleftright (Thirdhand)
description:
Updownleftright is a collection of four 4-player minigames in which contestants try to out-eat, out-jump, out-shoot, out-run, and out-wit their opponents. All players use different parts of the same keyboard as their controls: P1 uses the arrow keys and ctrl, P2 uses QWASD, P3 uses UIJKL, and P4 uses RTFGH. An extra USB keyboard may be helpful. 

This was my first ever foray into game development, and for the most part was made when I was just starting out as a programmer around 6 years ago. Consequently, there may be bugs present, but nothing game-breaking.

IF YOU ENCOUNTER ANY BUGS: Please run the "Snakes" minigame and have the snakes eat the bugs.

Made with Java using BlueJ and NetBeans
